Headline: Westbound #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shield, 33rd, Wallace, and 35th due to, construction near 35th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shield, 33rd, Wallace, and 35th due to, construction near 35th/Wentworth.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Yares/101st
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 100th, Torrence, and 103rd due to, construction near Yares/101st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 100th, Torrence, and 103rd due to, construction near Yares/101st.

Allow extra travel time.
